body_html: At inference time, there is now a InferenceHelper class to which you provide your sampling function, end_function, and an optional next_inputs function. That should allow you to avoid having to use the scheduled output helper.
body_text: At inference time, there is now a InferenceHelper class to which you provide your sampling function, end_function, and an optional next_inputs function.  That should allow you to avoid having to use the scheduled output helper.
body: At inference time, there is now a `InferenceHelper` class to which you provide your sampling function, end_function, and an optional `next_inputs` function.  That should allow you to avoid having to use the scheduled output helper.
